title: Facebook ads are suddenly doing better despite Apple advertising debacle
content:
Since Apple’s app tracking transparency feature began, Meta has seen shaky results regarding its advertising to iOS users. Meta, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, relies heavily on ad revenue and has seen damages from Apple’s ad changes.

more…

The post Facebook ads are suddenly doing better despite Apple advertising debacle appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Since Apple’s app tracking transparency began, Meta has seen shaky results regarding its ads to iOS users. However, things are improving.
